languages.text: "Понимаю. Я тоже всегда с почтением принимала реликвии из рук епископа Иеронимуса. Но Иеронимус — не все братство друзианцев. Поговори с миссионером, которого все зовут Капеллан. Он проповедует черни в "Адептус Амасекус". Со смертью епископа он стал новым лидером праведников на Футфоле, реликварий передан его заботам".

"I understand. I, too, had always accepted Reverend Hieronymus's relics with great reverence. However, there is more to the followers of Saint Drusus than Hieronymus Doloroso. Speak to the missionary everyone calls Chaplain. He preaches to the rabble at the Adeptus Amasecus. After Hieronymus's death, he became the new leader of the pious on Footfall and the new keeper of its reliquary."
languages.original_text: "Понимаю. Я тоже всегда с почтением принимала реликвии из рук епископа Иеронимуса. Но Иеронимус — не все братство друзианцев. Поговори с миссионером, которого все зовут Капеллан. Он проповедует черни в "Адептус Амасекус". Со смертью епископа он стал новым лидером праведников на Футфоле, реликварий передан его заботам".

languages.text: “我能理解，我也一样。在此之前，我也一直怀着无比崇敬的心情，从希罗尼穆斯牧师那里接受圣物。不过，圣德鲁苏斯的追随者不只有圣德鲁苏斯·多罗洛索一个人。你可以与被称为‘牧师’的那位传教士聊聊，他在艾玛赛克烈酒修会对那些乌合之众布道。希罗尼穆斯死了之后，他就成为了落脚港那些虔诚信徒的新任领袖，也成了落脚港圣骨匣的新任守护者。”
languages.original_text: "I understand. I, too, had always accepted Reverend Hieronymus's relics with great reverence. However, there is more to the followers of Saint Drusus than Hieronymus Doloroso. Speak to the missionary everyone calls Chaplain. He preaches to the rabble at the Adeptus Amasecus. After Hieronymus's death, he became the new leader of the pious on Footfall and the new keeper of its reliquary."

traits.locale_text: “我能理解，我也一样。在此之前，我也一直怀着无比崇敬的心情，从希罗尼穆斯牧师那里接受圣物。不过，圣德鲁苏斯的追随者不只有圣德鲁苏斯·多罗洛索一个人。你可以与被称为‘牧师’的那位传教士聊聊，他在艾玛赛克烈酒修会对那些乌合之众布道。希罗尼穆斯死了之后，他就成为了落脚港那些虔诚信徒的新任领袖，也成了落脚港圣骨匣的新任守护者。”
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: 「分かった。私も常に、ヒエロニムス司祭の聖遺物を心から尊敬していた。だが、ヒエロニムス・ドロローソ以外にも聖ドルススの信奉者はいる。教戒官と呼ばれているミッショナリーと話してみるがいい。アデプトゥス・アマセックで民衆に説教している男だ。ヒエロニムスの死後、この者はフットフォールの新しい指導者となり、つまり、聖遺物箱の新たな管理者となった」
languages.original_text: "I understand. I, too, had always accepted Reverend Hieronymus's relics with great reverence. However, there is more to the followers of Saint Drusus than Hieronymus Doloroso. Speak to the missionary everyone calls Chaplain. He preaches to the rabble at the Adeptus Amasecus. After Hieronymus's death, he became the new leader of the pious on Footfall and the new keeper of its reliquary."

traits.locale_text: 「分かった。私も常に、ヒエロニムス司祭の聖遺物を心から尊敬していた。だが、ヒエロニムス・ドロローソ以外にも聖ドルススの信奉者はいる。教戒官と呼ばれているミッショナリーと話してみるがいい。アデプトゥス・アマセックで民衆に説教している男だ。ヒエロニムスの死後、この者はフットフォールの新しい指導者となり、つまり、聖遺物箱の新たな管理者となった」
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: «Lo entiendo. Yo también había aceptado siempre las reliquias del reverendo Hieronymus con gran veneración. Sin embargo, los seguidores de san Drusus son más que los de Hieronymus Doloroso. Hable con el misionero al que todos llaman capellán. Predica a la chusma del Adeptus Amasecus. Tras la muerte de Hieronymus se convirtió en el nuevo líder de los devotos de Paso y en el nuevo guardián de su relicario».
languages.original_text: "I understand. I, too, had always accepted Reverend Hieronymus's relics with great reverence. However, there is more to the followers of Saint Drusus than Hieronymus Doloroso. Speak to the missionary everyone calls Chaplain. He preaches to the rabble at the Adeptus Amasecus. After Hieronymus's death, he became the new leader of the pious on Footfall and the new keeper of its reliquary."

traits.locale_text: «Lo entiendo. Yo también había aceptado siempre las reliquias del reverendo Hieronymus con gran veneración. Sin embargo, los seguidores de san Drusus son más que los de Hieronymus Doloroso. Hable con el misionero al que todos llaman capellán. Predica a la chusma del Adeptus Amasecus. Tras la muerte de Hieronymus se convirtió en el nuevo líder de los devotos de Paso y en el nuevo guardián de su relicario».
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Ich verstehe. Auch ich habe Reverend Hieronymus' Relikte immer mit großer Ehrfurcht akzeptiert. Doch die Anhänger des Heiligen Drusus bestehen nicht nur aus Hieronymus Doloroso. Sprecht mit dem Missionar, den alle Ordenspriester nennen. Er predigt zum Pöbel im Adeptus Amasecus. Nach Hieronymus' Tod ist er zum neuen Anführer der Frommen auf Footfall geworden, und zum neuen Hüter des Reliquiars."
languages.original_text: "I understand. I, too, had always accepted Reverend Hieronymus's relics with great reverence. However, there is more to the followers of Saint Drusus than Hieronymus Doloroso. Speak to the missionary everyone calls Chaplain. He preaches to the rabble at the Adeptus Amasecus. After Hieronymus's death, he became the new leader of the pious on Footfall and the new keeper of its reliquary."

traits.locale_text: "Ich verstehe. Auch ich habe Reverend Hieronymus' Relikte immer mit großer Ehrfurcht akzeptiert. Doch die Anhänger des Heiligen Drusus bestehen nicht nur aus Hieronymus Doloroso. Sprecht mit dem Missionar, den alle Ordenspriester nennen. Er predigt zum Pöbel im Adeptus Amasecus. Nach Hieronymus' Tod ist er zum neuen Anführer der Frommen auf Footfall geworden, und zum neuen Hüter des Reliquiars."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: « Je comprends. Moi aussi, j'ai toujours accepté les reliques du révérend Hiéronymus avec un profond respect, mais il n'est pas le seul disciple de Saint Drusus. Allez voir le missionnaire que tout le monde appelle Chapelain, il prêche la racaille de l'Adeptus Amasecus. Après la mort de Hiéronymus, il a pris la tête des croyants de Castel et est devenu le nouveau gardien de ses reliques. »
languages.original_text: "I understand. I, too, had always accepted Reverend Hieronymus's relics with great reverence. However, there is more to the followers of Saint Drusus than Hieronymus Doloroso. Speak to the missionary everyone calls Chaplain. He preaches to the rabble at the Adeptus Amasecus. After Hieronymus's death, he became the new leader of the pious on Footfall and the new keeper of its reliquary."

traits.locale_text: « Je comprends. Moi aussi, j'ai toujours accepté les reliques du révérend Hiéronymus avec un profond respect, mais il n'est pas le seul disciple de Saint Drusus. Allez voir le missionnaire que tout le monde appelle Chapelain, il prêche la racaille de l'Adeptus Amasecus. Après la mort de Hiéronymus, il a pris la tête des croyants de Castel et est devenu le nouveau gardien de ses reliques. »
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Anlıyorum. Muhterem Hieronymus'un yadigârlarını ben de hep büyük bir hürmetle kabul etmişimdir. Ancak Aziz Drusus'un takipçileri arasında sadece Muhterem Hieronymus yok. Herkesin Papaz dediği o misyonerle konuş. Adeptus Amasekus'taki ayaktakımına vaazlar veriyor. Hieronymus'un ölümünden sonra Binliman'daki yeni din önderi o oldu, kutsal emanet odasının yeni sorumlusu da o."
languages.original_text: "I understand. I, too, had always accepted Reverend Hieronymus's relics with great reverence. However, there is more to the followers of Saint Drusus than Hieronymus Doloroso. Speak to the missionary everyone calls Chaplain. He preaches to the rabble at the Adeptus Amasecus. After Hieronymus's death, he became the new leader of the pious on Footfall and the new keeper of its reliquary."

Hieronymus'un ölümünden sonra Binliman'daki yeni din önderi o oldu ve kutsal emanet odasının yeni sorumlusu da o."
